typical_assumptions: Walkthrough 1-2 stories per domain concept to validate model
Step through selected scenarios, not necessarily all scenarios in a story
Focus on understanding architecture and proving model works
Go step-by-step through complex flows to expose collaborations
Stop when patterns become repetitive and no new insights emerge
Prioritize business complexity (complex rules, workflows) and architectural complexity (new frameworks, libraries, integrations)
Break walks into logical chunks showing different object collaborations
Update domain model when gaps or contradictions discovered
